Computer.name: Randall's Laptop
Computer.file:
Even on the Netizen OS, there's still plenty of room to customize your system and make it your own! Here's some cool suggestions:
1. Remap the ports on your machine. Stops botnets from hammering certain ports and makes people stop and think about YOU and why YOU chose that port!
2. Side-load x-servers. This is a kinda controversial one and you need to be super careful when you do it. If you can "source" an x-server from somewhere, swap it by renaming your own x-server.sys in the sys/ directory to something random, then mv the x-server of your choice into sys/x-server.sys and reboot! Stylish!

yeah i know what u did randall. you owe me 50 bucks. go fuck yourself
you're still a bigger asshole than this guy's

Timesheets have been assigned to employee Randall Jones -- these should be filled out daily and then the finished result should be emailed to the employee's line manager on or before the 5th of the following month.
- Nutrico HR Contact: 2bd139be
